title: Listener Tales 16
description:
On Today’s episode of Listener Tales, Alaina gets teary eyed hearing the beautiful tale of a Momma turned owl, we hear all about your uninvited guests including a family nose picker and Ash finally breaks… no seriously! Reading is hard you guys. 
Listener tales are the best, if you have a listener tale you think we need to hear, please send to Morbidpodcast@gmail.com Be sure to put “Listener Tales” in the subject line along with your fun title!
As always thank you so much to our sponsors, 
Hunt a Killer: Right now, just for our listeners you can go to HuntAKiller.com/MORBID and use promo code MORBID at check out for 20% off your first box!!
Simplisafe: Try SimpliSafe today at SimpliSafe.com/MORBID. You get free shipping and a 60-day risk free trial. There’s nothing to lose!!! See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
